topic_details.summary: Climate change and environmental issues including global warming, carbon emissions, and international climate agreements and policies.
International conflicts and wars including Syria, Iraq, Afghanistan, and other military interventions and their humanitarian consequences.
Terrorism attacks, counterterrorism efforts, and security threats across various countries and regions.
Elections, political campaigns, and democratic processes in various countries including the United States and international elections.
Human rights violations, political prisoners, and authoritarian crackdowns on civil liberties and freedom of expression.
Natural disasters including earthquakes, tsunamis, hurricanes, floods, and their impact on affected communities.
Nuclear weapons programs, arms control negotiations, and international efforts to prevent nuclear proliferation.
Immigration, refugee crises, and border control issues affecting migrants and displaced populations worldwide.
Coronavirus pandemic including case tracking, vaccination efforts, public health measures, and global response to COVID-19.
Economic crises, financial instability, corruption scandals, and their impact on governments and societies.
